summary: Comprehensive testing of HRM Module and CMS features completed. All 25 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend testing verified: Admin login, CMS Editor with all 4 tabs (Pagina's, Footer, Instellingen, Design), Public landing page, AI Chatbot widget.

issues: Partner logo images show alt text 'Bedrijf A', 'Bedrijf B' etc. instead of actual logos - placeholder images not loaded (known issue from previous iteration)

passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/hrm/dashboard - Returns correct stats structure (employees, departments, leave, recruitment, contracts, salary)
Backend: GET /api/hrm/employees/{id} - Returns employee by ID
Backend: GET /api/hrm/settings - Returns HRM settings with defaults
Backend: POST /api/cms/upload-image - Image upload endpoint exists and works
Backend: POST /api/ai/chat - Authenticated AI chat works
Frontend: Admin dashboard shows tabs (Klanten, Betalingen, Add-ons, Domeinen, Website)
Frontend: CMS Editor (Website Beheer) loads with all 4 tabs (Pagina's, Footer, Instellingen, Design)
Frontend: CMS shows editable pages (Home, Prijzen, Over Ons, Voorwaarden, Privacy, Addons)
Frontend: Public landing page loads correctly
Frontend: Navigation links work (Home, Prijzen, Over Ons, Voorwaarden, Privacy)
Frontend: AI Chatbot widget opens and shows welcome message
action_items: Minor: Replace placeholder partner logos on landing page with actual company logos (known issue)
seed_data_creation: Test employees and departments created during testing with TEST_ prefix, then deleted

admin_login.description: Admin login with admin@facturatie.sr/admin123 works correctly

cms_editor.description: CMS Editor page (/app/website-beheer) loads with all 4 tabs: Pagina's, Footer, Instellingen, Design

cms_image_upload.description: POST /api/cms/upload-image endpoint exists and accepts image uploads

hrm_dashboard_api.description: GET /api/hrm/dashboard returns correct stats structure with employees, departments, leave, recruitment, contracts, salary data

hrm_employees_crud.description: Full CRUD operations work: GET list, POST create, GET by ID, PUT update, DELETE

hrm_departments_crud.description: CRUD operations work: GET list, POST create, DELETE

hrm_settings_api.description: GET returns default settings, PUT updates settings correctly

public_landing_page.description: Landing page loads with CMS content, navigation links work

ai_chatbot.description: AI Chatbot widget opens, shows welcome message, has quick action buttons

notes.hrm_frontend_access: HRM frontend pages (/app/hrm/*) are protected by SubscriptionRoute which redirects superadmin to /admin. This is correct behavior - HRM module is for customers with HRM add-on, not for superadmin. Backend APIs work correctly for superadmin.
notes.cms_editor_location: CMS Editor is accessible at /app/website-beheer (not via admin dashboard Website tab which shows a simplified view)

context_for_next_testing_agent: All HRM APIs tested and working. CMS Editor has 4 tabs (Pagina's, Footer, Instellingen, Design). HRM frontend pages are customer-only (protected by SubscriptionRoute). Admin credentials: admin@facturatie.sr / admin123. AI Chatbot uses GPT via emergentintegrations.llm.chat.
